title: shrI gaNanAtham
sahitya:
shrI gaNanAtham bhajarE citta parAshakti yutam


anupallavi

 nAga yajna sUtradharam nAdalayAnanda karam


caraNam   AgamAdi sannutam akhila dEva pUjitam yOgashAli bhAvitam bhOgishAyi sEvitam 
rAgadvESAdi rahita ramaNIya hrdaya vidhitam shrIguruguha sammuditam cinmUla kamalasthitam
